title: Schedules

serviceNamePlaceholder: E.g. Standard Consultation, Initial Assessment, etc.
serviceCapacityDescription: How many clients can be served simultaneously
serviceCapacityNote: In duration, enter the average time for each individual service.
byArrivalTimeDescription: Clients are scheduled by time range instead of specific time
arrivalTimeInfo: This service allows serving {{capacity}} clients simultaneously in the same period. Clients will be informed about the arrival time range, instead of a specific time.
arrivalTimeServiceDescription: This service uses the arrival time scheduling system. The client should arrive during the specified time range ({{timeSlot}}). Maximum capacity: {{capacity}} people.
arrivalTimeServiceNote: Note: The client will be informed that they should arrive within the time range and that there may be a wait depending on the arrival order.

serviceDeleteError: Error deleting service. Please try again.

durationCalculationFeedback: The end time will be automatically calculated based on the {{duration}} duration of the {{service}} service.

availabilityDeleteError: Error deleting availability. Please try again.
availabilitySaveError: Error saving availability. Please try again.
startTimeMustBeBeforeEndTime: Start time must be before end time
noHolidaysConfigured: No holidays or days off configured

confirmDeleteHoliday: Are you sure you want to delete this holiday/day off?

holidaysFetchError: Error loading holidays/days off. Please try again.
recurringDescription: If checked, this holiday/day off will repeat every year on the same date
providerHolidayDescription: If no provider is selected, it will apply to all
timeRequiredWhenNotAllDay: Start and end times are required when not all day
holidayTitlePlaceholder: E.g. National Holiday, Day Off, Vacation, etc.
defaultSlotDurationDescription: Defines the size of time slots for services with arrival time scheduling
serviceDurationDescription: Enter the exact service duration in minutes

variablesHelp: You can use the following variables in your notification content

deleteTemplateWarning: This action cannot be undone. All settings associated with this template will also be deleted.

multipleTimesHelp: You can add multiple times to send reminders for the same appointment.
timeBeforeDescription: Set when the reminder will be sent before the appointment
